Goals¶

Primary Goal¶

Create a repeatable jupyterhub - infrastructure as code that runs on-top of a CHS managed EKS service.

This parallels the use of terraform and docker-compose

WBS¶

ODC Hub¶

  1. create an odc directory

  2. Start a docker compose jup hub that uses odc container

  3. Test the container

Done¶
